title: Surfing in Britain? Itâ€™s Chilly but Brilliant and Widening in Appeal.
description: On the North Devon coast, where breathtaking cliffs give way to barreling waves, the surfing scene can hold its own among the best in Europe, and more girls and women are taking it on.
dc:creator: Isabella Kwai
media:credit: Mary Turner for The New York Times
media:description: Members of Wave Wahines, a surf club for women and girls, taking part in an afternoon lesson this month on Croyde Beach in North Devon, England.
